comments.body: It would be nice to add a single comment in this file explaining `X-workers` was deprecated in Spark 1.0
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -50,16 +50,16 @@ class ApplicationMasterArguments(val args: Array[String]) {
           userArgsBuffer += value
           args = tail
 
-        case ("--num-workers") :: IntParam(value) :: tail =>
-          numWorkers = value
+        case ("--num-workers" | "--num-executors") :: IntParam(value) :: tail =>
